summary: Diff implements the Final Proposal pacing beats (MISSION COMPLETE → Pause… → New mode? → DUO MODE REQUEST) and updates Level 4 screen heading/tagline plus two moments and final message. Mini Game 3 copy/logic, Ending/Achievement screen text, and the generated badge asset/rendering are not evidenced in the provided diff summary. Level 4 script may not match “exactly” due to wording/capitalization differences.

missing_requirements.requirement: Level 4 screen copy and headings must match the provided script exactly (tagline, two appreciation moments, and result text).
missing_requirements.reason: Although Level 4 heading/tagline/final message are present, at least one appreciation moment’s wording/capitalization differs (e.g., “i”, “falling part”), so it does not demonstrate an exact verbatim match.

missing_requirements.requirement: Mini Game 3 Penalty Shootout screen must match script exactly (prompt, question, four choices text; only “Efforts and showing up” correct; success texts “GOAL!” and “GOAL SCORED IN JOSHI'S HEART”).
missing_requirements.reason: No changes for the Mini Game 3 screen/component are shown in the diff summary; none of the required prompt/question/choices/success text logic is evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ending/Achievement screen after YES must match script: “ACHIEVEMENT UNLOCKED”, title “Valentine Partner 2026”, exactly three rewards with exact wording, and final line “Best matches are played with great teamwork.”
missing_requirements.reason: No ending/achievement screen file changes are shown; required title/rewards/quote and acceptance flow rendering are not evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add generated 512x512 PNG badge at frontend/public/assets/generated/valentine-achievement-badge.dim_512x512.png and render it on Ending/Achievement screen as a static asset (no backend fetch).
missing_requirements.reason: No new asset file is added (ADDED FILES: none), and no evidence of rendering the badge on the ending screen appears in modified files shown.

hallucinated_features.description: Dynamic “YES” button scaling based on a “try again” counter and related state/handlers in the proposal screen.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 only specifies proposal pacing/messages; it does not request button growth mechanics or a try-again counter.
